note: IMPORTANT: This VPN requires servers running the custom Python VPN server (vpn_server.py). Free public VPN services (ProtonVPN, Windscribe, etc.) use different protocols and WILL NOT WORK. You need to deploy your own servers. See FREE_SERVERS_INFO.md for setup instructions.
security_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è NEVER use untrusted public servers - they could monitor your traffic, steal data, or inject malware. Always use servers you trust or deploy your own!

israel.description: Israel VPN server - Deploy vpn_server.py on a VPS in Israel
israel.setup_guide: 1. Get VPS in Israel (DigitalOcean, AWS, etc.) 2. Install Python 3.7+ 3. Run: python3 vpn_server.py --port 8888 --password your_password
israel.free_option: Use Oracle Cloud Always-Free tier (Israel region available)

oracle_cloud.name: Oracle Cloud Always-Free Tier
oracle_cloud.description: ALWAYS FREE - No credit card required for basic tier. 2 AMD-based VMs, 4 ARM-based VMs, 10TB data transfer

google_cloud.name: Google Cloud Free Tier
google_cloud.description: $300 free credit (valid for 90 days) - Enough for several months of small VMs

azure.name: Microsoft Azure Free Account
azure.description: $200 free credit for 30 days + Always-free services

recommended_free_setup.reason: Truly free forever (no credit card required for basic tier), multiple regions available
steps: 2. Create a VM instance in your target country

9. Add server IP to servers.json in the app
